item.title: Re: Lmao-Pkz V2! Finally Finished! And Last Release
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“Deathspirit, post:42, topic:309859”][quote author=pk3r john link=topic=406282.msg3004382#msg3004382 date=1256257557]

[quote author=Deathspirit link=topic=406282.msg3004096#msg3004096 date=1256244775]

[quote author=pk3r john link=topic=406282.msg3004025#msg3004025 date=1256240926]

[quote author=Deathspirit link=topic=406282.msg3003774#msg3003774 date=1256228756]

Stop flaming him you fucking lowlifes. He’s contributing to the community by releasing his source.

And:

lol sad you took owner fritz shit you took antonio shit give credits to them

Fuck you.

Some credits to tonic seeing on how i used his ags guys and format

Bullshit!

The ags guy was cut by me, FUCKING ME! i got it from zybez community by looking through the character thread and picked that dude, then cutted him and used him as a sprite. And Tonic i can’t believe you did this, wow…

Isn’t leeching from r00n-serba enough?
And now you claim something someone cut off as yours?

Proof if you guys don’t believe me, empirescape v2 has those dudes, also here’s the project file i still have:
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 21, 2009, 10:38:39 am[/size][hr]P.S. Sorry for evading, i just HAD to claim my things.

P.S2. Sorry for double posting, i can’t edit my post. XD

fuck you for taking a picture so damn serious like it’s your life

baby remove this topic, please leecher

And please just gtfo. If you’re gonna release, EXPECT IT TO GET FUCKING LEECHED U DUMBSHIT!
EDIT 2: Oh btw, he didn’t leech shit. He worked for a long time at this, and of course he isn’t a “amg pr0 c0d3rz”, 95% of people on mopar can’t code much.

Gj, babykid. Rep++

Oh btw gtfo Ranger Squad plz go suck a dick

[/quote]Well a good coder like Mitko would know that it takes alot of time to make that… Mayby not but it’s HIS creation and i think he doesn’t want kids to steal it for release so it isn’t special anymore? Right niQQa??? Well anyway i think you are the 95% wich can’t code

Hm? The only releases I’ve seen you release are shitty fuckin allstarscapes that can suck a dick
And + you’re the one who’s taking an image so damn serious, like really, just gtfo the computer.
[/quote]Yeah i agreed who the Fuck are you talking about chap? i never released any source and believe me i’m programming servers for a long time there’s no need for releasing allstars sources… Well for you it is to leech huh? Anyway yes i want a good job if i’m some older that’s why i don’t have time anymore to “Make a fight” with kids like you…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 22, 2009, 02:54:55 pm[/size][hr][quote author=pk3r john link=topic=406282.msg3004025#msg3004025 date=1256240926]

Stop flaming him you fucking lowlifes. He’s contributing to the community by releasing his source.

And:

lol sad you took owner fritz shit you took antonio shit give credits to them

Fuck you.

Some credits to tonic seeing on how i used his ags guys and format

Bullshit!

The ags guy was cut by me, FUCKING ME! i got it from zybez community by looking through the character thread and picked that dude, then cutted him and used him as a sprite. And Tonic i can’t believe you did this, wow…

Isn’t leeching from r00n-serba enough?
And now you claim something someone cut off as yours?

Proof if you guys don’t believe me, empirescape v2 has those dudes, also here’s the project file i still have:
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 21, 2009, 10:38:39 am[/size][hr]P.S. Sorry for evading, i just HAD to claim my things.

P.S2. Sorry for double posting, i can’t edit my post. XD

fuck you for taking a picture so damn serious like it’s your life

baby remove this topic, please leecher

And please just gtfo. If you’re gonna release, EXPECT IT TO GET FUCKING LEECHED U DUMBSHIT!
EDIT 2: Oh btw, he didn’t leech shit. He worked for a long time at this, and of course he isn’t a “amg pr0 c0d3rz”, 95% of people on mopar can’t code much.

Gj, babykid. Rep++

Oh btw gtfo Ranger Squad plz go suck a dick

[/quote]Well a good coder like Mitko would know that it takes alot of time to make that… Mayby not but it’s HIS creation and i think he doesn’t want kids to steal it for release so it isn’t special anymore? Right niQQa??? Well anyway i think you are the 95% wich can’t code

Hm? The only releases I’ve seen you release are shitty fuckin allstarscapes that can suck a dick
And + you’re the one who’s taking an image so damn serious, like really, just gtfo the computer.
[/quote] Anyways try this next time i think it’ll clear things up for you http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=403077;sa=showPosts

Edit: I remember you making this topic http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,401117.msg2973312.html#msg2973312 i have no idea why you should not agree with Mitko…

I like Mitko, where did I ever say I don’t agree with him?

I disagree with all you idiots who fight over a damn picture. God, the internet is full of shitbags like you and that Mitko5 impersonator.
[/quote]He made that picture and he’s not an impersonator Mitko got banned of moparscape…[/quote]

Who gives a damn if he made it? sounds like you’re a suck up.

And, if Mitko really did get banned, and Mitko5 is his new account, that means he is evading ban.

Read full topic

And + you’re the one who’s taking an image so damn serious, like really, just gtfo the computer.[/quote]Yeah i agreed who the Fuck are you talking about chap? i never released any source and believe me i’m programming servers for a long time there’s no need for releasing allstars sources… Well for you it is to leech huh? Anyway yes i want a good job if i’m some older that’s why i don’t have time anymore to “Make a fight” with kids like you…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 22, 2009, 02:54:55 pm[/size][hr][quote=“pk3r john, post:31, topic:309859”][quote author=Deathspirit link=topic=406282.msg3003774#msg3003774 date=1256228756]

Stop flaming him you fucking lowlifes. He’s contributing to the community by releasing his source.

And:

lol sad you took owner fritz shit you took antonio shit give credits to them

Fuck you.

Some credits to tonic seeing on how i used his ags guys and format

Bullshit!

The ags guy was cut by me, FUCKING ME! i got it from zybez community by looking through the character thread and picked that dude, then cutted him and used him as a sprite. And Tonic i can’t believe you did this, wow…

Isn’t leeching from r00n-serba enough?
And now you claim something someone cut off as yours?

Proof if you guys don’t believe me, empirescape v2 has those dudes, also here’s the project file i still have:
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 21, 2009, 10:38:39 am[/size][hr]P.S. Sorry for evading, i just HAD to claim my things.

P.S2. Sorry for double posting, i can’t edit my post. XD

fuck you for taking a picture so damn serious like it’s your life

baby remove this topic, please leecher

And please just gtfo. If you’re gonna release, EXPECT IT TO GET FUCKING LEECHED U DUMBSHIT!
EDIT 2: Oh btw, he didn’t leech shit. He worked for a long time at this, and of course he isn’t a “amg pr0 c0d3rz”, 95% of people on mopar can’t code much.

Gj, babykid. Rep++

Oh btw gtfo Ranger Squad plz go suck a dick

[/quote]Well a good coder like Mitko would know that it takes alot of time to make that… Mayby not but it’s HIS creation and i think he doesn’t want kids to steal it for release so it isn’t special anymore? Right niQQa??? Well anyway i think you are the 95% wich can’t code

Hm? The only releases I’ve seen you release are shitty fuckin allstarscapes that can suck a dick
And + you’re the one who’s taking an image so damn serious, like really, just gtfo the computer.[/quote] Anyways try this next time i think it’ll clear things up for you http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=403077;sa=showPosts

Edit: I remember you making this topic http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,401117.msg2973312.html#msg2973312 i have no idea why you should not agree with Mitko…

item.title: Re: Lmao-Pkz V2! Finally Finished! And Last Release
item.dc:creator: @Mitko5 Mitko5
item.description:
@Mitko5 wrote:

Credits go to the person that MADE, not that POSTED.
This is like saying credits for the client goes to blah blah blah, but actually 100% credits go to Jagex and not the dude that released the client with his source.
In this case, i cut the characters, I was the first to release them on the client with a working interface. You can say that credtis go to Jagex for the character… but this is rsps so the ORIGINAL “creator” of these 2 sprites that cut them and used them on an interface is me.

I’m done with this shit, agree or don’t i’m not dealing with this anymore. I’m out of this thread.

EDIT: Ooh, what’s that i see?
The blank button i used paint to put text “Click here to play” on it.

Read full topic
